venue_description: The World Equestrian Center in Wilmington, Ohio is part of a complex that boasts expansive, climate‑controlled indoor and outdoor equestrian sports facilities built on the core principles of quality, class and distinctionhttps://worldequestriancenter.com/about/#:~:text=With%20locations%20in%20Wilmington%2C%20Ohio,sports%20facilities%20in%20the%20world. The Wilmington venue hosts premier equestrian events at its state‑of‑the‑art showgrounds.

prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for World Equestrian Center Ohio (venue_uid=wcoh-venue)","Location":"city: Wilmington city_uid=wilmington, state:OH state_uid=oh.","GEO context":"lat=39.4111839, lon=-83.8887122 placeid=Eio0MDk1IE9ILTczMCAjMmMsIFdpbG1pbmd0b24sIE9IIDQ1MTc3LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCd-2Wpl_wUCIEcI-ZJ4XGJyyEgIyYw.","Official venue link":"https://worldequestriancenter.com/wilmington-oh/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

  "venue_uid": "wcoh-venue",

venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
